text: The men's team sabre competition of the fencing event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 6 June 2015 at the OCBC Arena Hall 2 in Kallang, Singapore. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! title: Fencing at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's team sabre
